entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 a.m. PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 7:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to 1000 metres this morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Snow level 800 metres. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
